Display a MEDprofile figure

Here is a list of what you can do with the interactive figure:

  • Display/Hide point values by clicking near the corresponding point.

  • Set the time relative to a specific class by pressing “r” on your keyboard while hovering over the desired class. The same action can be used to retrieve the absolute time.

[1]:

import os
import pickle
import random

os.chdir('..')

from MEDclasses import *
from MEDprofiles.src.semi_front.MEDprofileFigure import MEDprofileFigure

# Set the figure interactive
%matplotlib qt

Get a MEDprofile

[2]:

# Load the pickle file
data_file = open('data/mimic/MEDprofiles_bin', 'rb')
MEDprofile_list = pickle.load(data_file)
data_file.close()

[3]:

# Select randomly a MEDprofile
cohort = MEDcohort(list_MEDprofile=MEDprofile_list)
df = cohort.profile_list_to_df()
patient_id = random.choice(df.index)
df_profile = df.loc[[patient_id]]

Set the figure

[4]:

# Define the classes attributes dict
classes_attributes_dict = {'demographic': ([], 'compact'), 'labevent': (['sodium_max', 'sodium_min', 'sodium_trend'], 'complete'), 'nrad': (['attr_0', 'attr_1', 'attr_2'], 'compact'), 'vp': ([], 'compact')}

[5]:

# Create the figure through the MEDprofileFigure class
figure = MEDprofileFigure(classes_attributes_dict, patient_id, df_profile)
